data.meta_description: CAD Micro solutions is an official reseller for Cadence software. Cadence OrCAD X simplifies PCB design. OrCAD X is an integrated platform for all stages of the design process, allowing its users to design fast, correct, and connected.
data.text:
Design fast, correct, and connected. The Cadence OrCAD X Platform is advanced PCB design software that is tailored to the needs of modern design. Built on the powerful Cadence Allegro X technology, it offers an intuitive and efficient user experience that helps you quickly turn your big ideas into detailed comprehensive designs.

OrCAD X excels in quick-turn PCB designs by addressing common challenges faced by teams. OrCAD X includes built-in features like: real-time insights, simplified manufacturing, and live DRCs to help your team overcome issues and quickly turn out designs. OrCAD platform offers:

Thank you for expressing your interest in Cadence software. For more information, complete the form below and a member of our team will reach out to you as soon as possible. If you have difficulties completing the form, you can click here.
